Summary: Enterprise Portal - Production-Grade Blockchain Management Platform
Description: Comprehensive blockchain management platform with real-time analytics, AI optimization, and quantum-resistant security. Includes dashboards, transaction/block explorers, validator management, AI controls, quantum security, cross-chain bridge, and HMS integration.

Collapsible sidebar with hierarchical navigation including: toggle collapse/expand, organized sections (Main, Blockchain, Assets, Advanced, System), active page highlighting, badge indicators for live features, responsive mobile adaptation.

Summary: Build Top Navigation Bar with Search
Description: Fixed top bar with global search, live status indicator, notification center with badge, theme switcher (dark/light), help/documentation access, and user profile menu.
Auto-responsive grid for all screen sizes with card hover effects, consistent spacing/alignment, and mobile-first design.
Reusable modal system for transaction details, form actions, confirmations, with backdrop blur and keyboard navigation (ESC to close).
Dark/light theme toggle with smooth transitions, LocalStorage persistence, and system preference detection.
Real-time overview cards showing: Total Transactions (with trend), Network TPS, Active Validators, Current Block Height. Auto-refresh every 5 seconds with gradient backgrounds.
Line chart showing TPS over time with 24-hour historical data, time range selector (1H/24H/7D), Chart.js visualization, smooth gradient fills, responsive resizing.
Doughnut chart showing transaction type breakdown (Transfer/Token/NFT/Contract) with color-coded segments, percentages, and interactive legend.
Live table of recent blockchain transactions with 5-second refresh, showing TX hash, type, addresses, amount, status badges, clickable rows for details, filter/export capabilities, pagination.
Comprehensive network health metrics: Network Health Score (0-100%), Average Block Time, Network Latency, progress bars, 24-hour activity chart, historical trend comparison.
Deep dive into transaction patterns: volume over time, peak periods, type distribution, fee analysis, success/failure rates, geographic distribution.
Validator performance metrics: individual scores, uptime stats, block proposal success rates, stake distribution, rankings, reward distribution.
System-level performance: CPU/Memory over time, network bandwidth, database performance, API response times, cache hit rates, optimization recommendations.
Live system health dashboard with service status indicators, real-time log streaming, alert threshold config, performance graphs, uptime tracking, auto-refresh.
Alert configuration and notification: custom rules, email/SMS/webhook notifications, severity levels, alert history, escalation policies, mute/snooze functionality.
Automated health checking for all services: HTTP endpoint monitoring, database connection checks, Redis/cache health, gRPC service status, external API availability, health history.
Advanced transaction search/filtering: search by TX hash/address/block, advanced filters (type/status/date/amount), multi-column sort, export (CSV/JSON), bulk operations, replay capability.
Comprehensive transaction info: full data (hash/from/to/amount/gas/nonce), timeline (submitted→confirmed→finalized), block details, event logs/receipts, smart contract interactions, related TXs.
Create and submit new transactions: multi-step wizard, gas estimation, TX preview, signature support, batch creation, transaction templates.
Paginated block list: block height/hash/timestamp/validator, transaction count per block, block size/gas used, sort/filter, real-time new block notifications.
Detailed block information: header info, transaction list in block, block proposer details, signatures, state root/receipts root, uncle blocks.
Visual timeline of block production: interactive timeline graph, block time variations, missed block indicators, validator rotation visualization, zoom/pan capabilities.
List of all network validators: name/address/stake amount, status (active/inactive/jailed), commission rates, uptime percentage, total delegations, detail page links.
Individual validator performance tracking: block proposal stats, attestation performance, slash history, reward distribution, performance charts, comparison with network average.
Delegate tokens to validators: validator selection with recommendations, delegation amount calculator, reward estimation, re-delegation, undelegation with unbonding period, delegation history.
Real-time consensus monitoring: current leader display, consensus round info, participant nodes list, vote tallying visualization, consensus health metrics, leader election history.
Submit proposals to consensus layer: proposal creation form, validation, signature collection, status tracking, proposal history.
List and manage all tokens: name/symbol/total supply, token type (fungible/non-fungible), creator/creation date, current holders count, transfer activity charts, metadata display.
Create new tokens: multi-step creation, token standard selection (ERC-20/ERC-721), properties config, metadata upload, initial distribution setup, preview and deployment.
Token-specific analytics: price charts (if trading), volume analytics, holder distribution, transfer velocity, token utility metrics.
Browse all NFTs: grid/list view toggle, NFT preview (image/video/3D), collection grouping, filters (collection/rarity/price), search, sort (newest/price/rarity).
Comprehensive NFT information: high-res media display, NFT metadata/properties, ownership history, transaction history, current owner details, related NFTs from collection.
Create and mint new NFTs: media upload (image/video/audio/3D), metadata editor, property/trait config, royalty settings, collection assignment, batch minting support.
List of all deployed smart contracts: address/name/type, deployment date/deployer, verification status, interaction count, source code availability, ABI download.
Interact with smart contracts: read/write functions with gas estimation, function parameter forms, transaction result display, event log viewing, multi-call support.
Deploy new smart contracts: Solidity editor with syntax highlighting, contract compilation, constructor parameter input, gas estimation, deployment confirmation, contract verification.
AI/ML optimization metrics: model performance metrics, optimization suggestions, auto-tuning status, training history, model comparison, A/B testing results.
Configure AI optimization: model selection (consensus optimization/fraud detection), hyperparameter tuning, training data management, model versioning, rollback capability, performance benchmarking.

Quantum-resistant cryptography monitoring: CRYSTALS-Kyber key exchange status, CRYSTALS-Dilithium signature status, quantum threat level, encryption strength metrics, key rotation schedule, security audit logs.
Manage cryptographic keys: key generation, import/export (secure), key rotation, backup/recovery, multi-signature support, hardware wallet integration.
Sign and verify data using quantum-resistant algorithms: signing interface, signature verification, batch signing, signature history, algorithm selection (Dilithium2/3/5).
Cross-chain bridge activity: total value locked (TVL), bridge transaction volume, supported chains list, active bridges count, transfer success rate, average transfer time.
Initiate cross-chain asset transfers: source/destination chain selection, asset selection/amount input, fee calculation, transfer preview, transaction tracking, transfer history.
Track cross-chain transaction status: real-time status updates, multi-step progress indicator, confirmation counts, relay node info, failed transaction handling, manual claim interface.
Healthcare data management overview: total patients/records, active providers, record access logs, data privacy compliance metrics, integration health status, recent activity feed.
Manage healthcare records on blockchain: patient record search, access control management, record encryption status, consent management, audit trail viewing, record sharing interface.
Provider-specific functionality: provider registration, credential verification, access request management, treatment record submission, billing integration, compliance reporting.
Run and monitor performance tests: test suite selection, custom test config, real-time execution monitoring, results visualization, historical comparison, performance regression detection.
Configure and run load tests: transaction load simulator, concurrent user simulation, ramp-up config, target TPS setting, duration control, test scenario templates.
Visualize network structure: interactive network graph, node status indicators, connection visualization, geographic distribution map, peer info display, network health metrics.
Manage network peers: peer list with status, add/remove peers, peer info details, connection quality metrics, peer reputation scores, blacklist/whitelist management.
Platform-wide configuration: general settings (network name/chain ID), performance tuning parameters, security settings, API configuration, feature flags, maintenance mode toggle.
Manage portal users and permissions: user list/search, role-based access control (RBAC), permission management, user creation/deletion, activity audit logs, session management.
Manage API access keys: API key generation, permission scoping, rate limit configuration, key rotation, usage statistics, key revocation.
Generate custom reports: report template selection, date range selection, data filter config, format selection (PDF/CSV/JSON/Excel), scheduled reports, email delivery.
Export blockchain data: bulk data export, custom query builder, export format options, incremental export, export scheduling, cloud storage integration (S3).
Central hub for all notifications: notification list with filters, mark as read/unread, notification categories, priority indicators, action buttons, notification history.
Configure custom alerts: alert rule builder, condition config (threshold/trend/anomaly), notification channel selection, alert frequency control, test alert functionality, alert template library.
